% https://q.uiver.app/#
\[\begin{tikzcd}
	&& {(X \times Y) \times Z} \\
	&& {X \times (Y \times Z)} \\
	&& {X' \times (Y' \times Z')} \\
	\\
	{X'} && {Y'} && {Z'}
	\arrow["{\langle \lambda_{X}, \lambda_{Y}, \lambda_{Z} \rangle}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\langle f \circ \rho_{X}, g \circ \rho_{Y}, h \circ \rho_{Z} \rangle}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\rho_{X'}}"', from=3-3, to=5-1]
	\arrow["{\rho_{Y'}}"{description}, from=3-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow["{\rho_{Z'}}", from=3-3, to=5-5]
	\arrow["{f \circ \lambda_{X}}"', curve={height=18pt}, from=1-3, to=5-1]
	\arrow["{g \circ \lambda_{Y}}"', curve={height=30pt}, from=1-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow["{h \circ \lambda_{Z}}"{pos=0.3}, curve={height=-18pt}, from=1-3, to=5-5]
\end{tikzcd}\]
